DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : 1 . Evaluate efficacy Adapalene gel 0.3 % compare Tretinoin Emollient cream 0.05 % , reduce sign cutaneous photoageing , measure trough photonumeric scale evaluation , investigator evaluation global response treatment subject 's evaluation improvement . 2 . Evaluate safety tolerability Adapalene Gel 0.3 % , compare Tretinoin Emollient cream 0.05 % 24 week treatment . The study clinical hypothesis Adapalene Gel 0.3 % effective Tretinoin Emollient cream 0.05 % treatment cutaneous photoaging .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparative Study Adapalene Gel,0.3 % Versus Tretinoin Emollient Cream , 0.05 % Treatment Photoaging

Patients maintain contraceptive study 1 additional month completion ; For subject treatment concomitant medical condition , type dose must stable least three month prior study entry ( least one year , case hormone replacement therapy ) change study .
